Posts.Content: Thank you for all the replies I feel a little better knowing I am not the only one feeling like this. I had a really emotional day yesterday, woke up this morning still feeling abit down but I am going to try and motivate myself and try and get on with things its just so hard I find myself thinking about things like what if it comes back, when will my hair be back to how it used to be and so on sorry for going on it would just be nice to wake up in the morning not thinking about cancer, its just so tiring.
Posts.Title: feeling so sad and angry after having had breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi Anne goodluck for today know exactly what your feeling, will be thinking of you x
Posts.Title: First Chemo Today - Moral Support Request

Posts.Content: Hi I don't know quite what to say been and seen my best friend today and she told me the doctor as felt some lumps and as refer her to the breast clinic to check out. Im in shock I know I shouldn't think the worstbut this was me this time last year, I told her she will be fine but now I feel like why did isay that I dontknow I just feel for her it as just brought it all back.
Posts.Title: my best friend has found some lumps

Posts.Content: Hi I was diagnosed with breast cancer in 2013 . I have finished all my treatment , I had chemotherapy followed by radiotherapy and I am now on tamoxifen. Iwas just wondering how others feel when all treatment finishes because I thought I would be back to my normal self but im not ifeel happy that im ok now but I feel sad and angry some days. I feel frightened it might come back and I now have but I just cant wait for it to be long again, is it normal to feel like this
Posts.Title: feeling sad and angry after having had breast cancer
